byline.contributor: Lizette Alvarez reported from Fort Myers, and Richard Pérez-Peña from New York. Les Neuhaus contributed reporting from Fort Myers, Mike McPhate from New York, and Alan Blinder from Atlanta.
byline.original: By LIZETTE ALVAREZ and RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA

abstract: Authorities apprehend three suspects involved in fatal shooting at Club Blu nightclub in Fort Myers, Fla, that killed teens Sean Archilles and Stef’An Strawder and wounded 18 others; investigation into motive continues behind shooting officials claim was not terrorism-related.
lead_paragraph: Three people were detained for questioning. The police gave no immediate indication of a possible motive but said the attack was “not a terrorist act.”

headline.main: Shooting at Nightclub in Fort Myers, Florida, Leaves 2 Teenagers Dead
headline.print_headline: 2 Teenagers Killed in Florida Nightclub Shooting

snippet: Three people were detained for questioning. The police gave no immediate indication of a possible motive but said the attack was “not a terrorist act.”...
